mapper.sql: id, remark, config_name AS configName, config_key AS configKey, config_value AS configValue, config_type AS configType, create_time AS createTime, create_By AS createBy
mapper.select:
select s.id AS id, s.config_name AS configName, s.config_key AS configKey, s.config_value AS configValue, case when s.config_Type='Y' then '是' else '否' end AS configType, s.remark AS remark, s.create_time AS createTime, u.name AS createBy from sys_config s left join sys_user u ON s.create_by=u.id
and s.config_name like CONCAT ('%',#{configName},'%')
and s.config_key like CONCAT ('%',#{configKey},'%')
and s.config_Type = '${configType}'
and (s.create_time between CONCAT(#{startTime},' 00:00:00') and CONCAT(#{endTime},' 23:59:59'))
order by s.id asc
